system.description:
Prerequisites

When the character uses a firearm, paintball marker, bow, or crossbow, its range increment increases by 1½, rounded up to the nearest 5’.

Benefits

For the purpose of weapons with telescopic sights, a character can choose to use the original range increment for the purpose of avoiding the 1st range increment penalty.

Advanced Arms

Plasarms and lasarms can take the benefits that this feat gives. Elarms may not take the benefits that this feat gives unless otherwise specifically noted.
